newsitem.title: GERMANY: Otto Versand names Kuehne & Nagel preferred partner.
newsitem.headline: Otto Versand names Kuehne & Nagel preferred partner.

text.p: Kuehne & Nagel International AG said it has been named worldwide "preferred partner" for logistics by the German mail-order company, Otto Versand (GmbH & Co.).

The Germany division of Kuehne & Nagel said a strategic transport and logistics alliance has been agreed with Hamburg-based Otto Versand to cover all divisions and subsidiaries of the international mail-order company.
Kuehne & Nagel has already been responsible for Otto Versand imports for the last ten years, a company statement said.
Both companies expect synergy effects not only in freight transport but in areas such as quality control and international electronic communications, the statement added.

Kuehne & Nagel will also gradually transfer cargo moved by road, for example from Turkey, on to rail as part of an Otto Versand target to reduce CO2 emissions by 30 percent in ten years. - Air Cargo Newsroom Tel+44 171 542 7706 Fax+44 171 542 5017
